column2: "Aber a Manaasɛ hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe duebien; na odzii hen mfe eduonum enum wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wiadzefo a EWURADZE tuu hɔn fii Israelmba enyim no hɔn ndzeyɛɛ no tse."

column2: "Osiandɛ osii mbea sorɔnsorɔm a n'egya Hezekia bubui gui no bio; na osisii afɔrmbukyia dze maa Baalim no
column3: na ɔyɛɛ Aserot

column2: "Na osisii afɔrmbukyia wɔ EWURADZE fie a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm dɛ
column3: Jerusalɛm na me dzin bɛtsena hɔ daa no

column2: "Na osisii afɔrmbukyia dze memaa sor dɔm nyinara wɔ EWURADZE fie abangua ebien no do."
"Eso ɔhyeew ne mba wɔ ogya mu bɔɔ afɔr wɔ Hinom ne ba bɔnsa no mu: na ɔyɛɛ akɔmfodze
column3: na ɔkyeer nkaber
column5: na ɔnye asamamfrɛfo na abayifo yɛe: ɔbɔɔ mbusu pii wɔ EWURADZE enyi do dze yii no ebufuw."

column2: "Na ɔdze bosom no ne honyi a oesian a ɔyɛe no sii Nyankopɔn ne fi no mu
column3: dza Nyankopɔn kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ David na ne ba Solomon dɛ
column4: Ofi yi mu na Jerusalɛm a masan mu meyi no wɔ Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu no mu
column5: na medze me dzin mobɔto daa no a:"

column2: "nkyii so meremma Israel hɔn anan nntu mmfi asaase a mahyehyɛ ama hom egyanom no do bio; sɛ wɔrodwen do ara reyɛ dza medze ahyɛ hɔn no nyinara a
column3: mekyerɛ mbra na nhyehyɛɛ na ahyɛdze no a ɔnam Moses ne nsa do no a."

column2: "Na Manaasɛ yɛɛ Juda na Jerusalɛm mba no ma wɔfomee
column3: ma dɛm ntsi wɔbɔɔ mbusu dodow seen amanaman a EWURADZE sɛɛ hɔn wɔ Israelmba enyim no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Manaasɛ na ne man: naaso woenntsie."
"Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE maa Asiriahen dɔm do asafohemfo no baa hɔn do
column3: na wɔdze nkɔtɔkorba kyeer Manaasɛ

column2: "Na aber a ɔwɔ ahohiahia mu no nna ɔhwehwɛɛ n'EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn
column3: na ɔbrɛɛ noho adze kɛsenara wɔ n'egyanom Nyankopɔn no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔbɔɔ mpaa maa no; na Nyankopɔn tsiee n'akyɛpa
column3: na ɔtsee no nkotoserɛ no
column4: na ɔdze no sanee baa n'ahendzi no mu bio wɔ Jerusalɛm. Nna Manaasɛ hun dɛ EWURADZE no

column2: "Afei iyi ekyir no ɔtoow David kurow no ekyir fasu
column3: wɔ Gihon n'anee afamu
column5: mekyerɛ edze rokɔ enam kuropon no n'ahɛnee; na ɔdze bɔɔ Ofel ho aprɔw
column6: na ɔmaa do ma ɔkrɔɔn kɛsenara: na ɔdze asafohemfo a wɔyɛ ndam guguu Juda nkurow a wɔabobɔ ho ban nyinara mu."

column2: "Na oyiyii enyame nana no
column3: na abosom no fii EWURADZE ne fi no mu
column4: na afɔrmbukyia nyinara a osisii no wɔ EWURADZE ne fie bepɔw do
column6: na ɔdze fii kurow no mu kɔtotowee gui."

column2: "Na osii EWURADZE n'afɔrmbukyia no
column3: na ɔbobɔɔ asomdwee afɔr na ndaase afɔr
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ Juda dɛ wɔnsom EWURADZE

column2: "Naaso ɔman no daa ho ara bɔɔ okum afɔr wɔ mbea sorɔnsorɔm no do
column3: na hɔn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ara nko na wɔdze maa no."

column2: "Afei Manaasɛ no ho asɛm nkaa no
column3: na ne mpaa a ɔbɔe maa ne Nyankopɔn
column4: na adzehufo a wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no wɔ EWURADZE
column7: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo ho nsɛm no mu."

column2: "Eso ne mpaabɔ
column3: na mbrɛ Nyankopɔn sii na otsiee n'akyɛpa no
column4: na no bɔn na ne mbrato nyinara
column5: na fakor mbrɛ ɔtotoow mbea sorɔnsorɔm
column8: ansaana ɔrebrɛ noho adze no: hwɛ
column9: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Hozai n'abakɔsɛm no mu."

column2: "Nna Manaasɛ kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ nankasa ne fie: na ne babanyin Amon dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."

column2: "Aber a Amon hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu ebien; na odzii hen mfe ebien wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n'egya Manaasɛ yɛe: na Amon bɔɔ okum afɔr dze maa ehonyi a woesian a n'egya Manaasɛ yɛe no

column2: "Na ɔammbrɛ noho adze wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n'egya Manaasɛ brɛɛ noho adze no; na ɔnoara Amon yi mbom foom mbordo."

column2: "Na no nkowaa paam ne tsir do
column3: na wokum no wɔ nankasa ne fie."

column2: "Na asaase no do nkorɔfo no kunkum hɔn a wɔpaam ɔhen Amon ne tsir do no nyinara; na asaase no do nkorɔfo no hyɛɛ ne babanyin Josia ɔhen wɔ n'ananmu."
